channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New Secretary of State Marco Rubio pauses refugee operations, ramps up visa vetting

item.title: The Religion of a Political Movie
item.description: The Seed of the Sacred Fig — an Arabian Nights warning.

item.title: Trump faces coordinated onslaught of lawsuits over executive orders
item.description: The echo of President Trump's oath of office had barely died down Monday when the first lawsuits were filed to derail his plans.

item.title: Trump order puts thousands of Afghan allies waiting for US resettlement in limbo
item.description: A day-one Trump administration order puts on pause the plans of Afghan allies who have been approved for resettlement in the U.S.

item.title: Budget Office Report Shows Biden Could Have Inhibited The Border Crisis But Inflamed It Instead
item.description: Once Democrats realized the electoral implications of the border invasion, even their half-hearted half-measures helped to reverse the prior trends.

item.title: The Same LGBT Movement That Defamed Anita Bryant Is Vindicating Her Arguments
item.description: Conservatives and parents today fight the same left-wing extremism Anita Bryant did and face the same accusations and vitriol.

item.title: GOP leaders huddle with Trump but still haven't agreed on strategy to pass his agenda
item.description: Congressional Republican met with President Trump on Tuesday to hash out a legislative strategy but have yet to land on the same page.

item.title: How DOGE Could Save Black Lives and Empower American Policing
item.description: There is no reason to limit smart outsiders’ insights purely to the federal level of government.

item.title: Trump Announces $500B AI Infrastructure Plan That Could Help Cure Cancer
item.description: Trump called the initiative the 'greatest AI infrastructure project by far in history.'

item.title: Trump says he'd consider allowing Elon Musk to buy TikTok
item.description: President Trump said he is open to Elon Musk buying TikTok, just a day after he signed an order to delay the federal ban on the social media app.

item.description: On a new movie about Maria Callas starring Angelina Jolie.

item.title: The Israel-Hamas Hostage Deal Gives Too Much To Terrorists
item.description: The cost of the cease-fire to Israel for freeing only some of the hostages is handing Hamas and Iran an undeserved victory.

item.title: Stop Fighting Private Firefighting
item.description: If you can’t be absolutely confident in the government, the private sector needs to be allowed to deliver.

item.title: Nearly all of DC shut down for Trump's inauguration. So why was there no designated survivor?
item.description: Monday's ceremony saw historic safety protections. But no designated survivor was named, raising questions as to why.

item.title: This Corrupt Biden Pardon May Already Have Caused Innocent Deaths
